title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.14 - Coasting prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.14 - Coasting prohibited

State Regulations

Coasting is prohibited on the bridges. Gears shall be engaged
at all times while vehicles are in motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
